short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes for the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator is a simple and efficient extension that allows you to instantly generate a QR code for the current page you are visiting. With a single click, the extension displays a high-resolution PNG QR code, which you can easily scan or share. Additionally, you can download the QR code in EPS vector format for high-quality use in printing or design projects. The extension is easy to use, lightweight, and requires minimal permissions to function, making it a great tool for sharing links through QR codes.
